title: Greataxes
content:
Greataxes in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Greataxes are Two-Handed Martial Weapons in BG3 that can only be two-handed, dealing 1-12 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 1.5m, and they deal Slashing Damage, though some special Greataxes also deal another type of Damage as well. The exception to this is the Cultist Brand, which deals 1-8 Bludgeoning Damage instead.
